Descriptions.Description: Throw a sequence of numbers into a black hole. Several Black Hole modules combine into a bigger puzzle. Interspersing with other modules provides a shortcut.
Jeter une séquence de nombres dans un trou noir. Plusieurs modules Trou Noir complexifient le puzzle. Mais s'occuper d'autres modules le simplifie.

Souvenir.Explanation: In the case where there is more than one Black Hole on the bomb, Souvenir could ask which one (identified by the order in which they were solved) received the nth digit of the code.
